Package team_package

Class TeamView

java.lang.Object
team_package.TeamView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TeamView extends Object implements Serializable
The TeamView class represents the managed bean responsible for managing teams in a web application. It handles CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for teams and their members. This class interacts with a database to store and retrieve team information. It also manages the user interface for team management.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kilyan Bentchakal
See Also:

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the TeamView bean after construction. This method is annotated with @PostConstruct and is executed after the bean is created.

    • hasSelectedTeams

      public boolean hasSelectedTeams()
      Checks if there are selected teams.
      Returns:
      true if there are selected teams, false otherwise.

    • hasOneSelectedTeam

      public boolean hasOneSelectedTeam()
      Checks if there is exactly one selected team.
      Returns:
      true if there is one selected team, false otherwise.

    • getDeleteButtonMessage

      public String getDeleteButtonMessage()
      Gets the appropriate delete button message based on the number of selected teams.
      Returns:
      The delete button message.

    • editTeams

      public void editTeams()
      Edits the selected teams. This method is called when the "Edit" button is clicked. It sets the source and target members for the DualListModel based on the selected team.

    • getTeamsTable

      public List<Team> getTeamsTable()
      Retrieves the list of teams from the database.
      Returns:
      The list of teams.

    • getStudents

      public List<Student> getStudents()
      Retrieves the list of students from the database.
      Returns:
      The list of students.

    • availableStudents

      public List<Student> availableStudents(Team team)
      Returns a list of available students to join a team.
      Parameters:
      team - The team for which to obtain the list of available students.
      Returns:
      A list of available students to join the team.

    • openNew

      public void openNew()
      Initializes a new team with empty members. This method is called when a user wants to create a new team.

    • saveTeam

      public void saveTeam()
      Saves a team (new or existing) after making modifications. This method is called when the user wants to save a team. If the team's ID is null, a new unique ID is generated. Team members are updated with the target list (selected students).

    • DeleteTeams

      public void DeleteTeams(List<Team> selectedTeam)
      Deletes a list of teams from the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedTeam - The list of teams to be deleted.

    • deleteSelectedTeam

      public void deleteSelectedTeam()
      Deletes the selected teams from the list of teams. This method is called when the user wants to delete selected teams. It also updates the user interface to reflect the changes.

    • checkInitTable

      public void checkInitTable()
      Checks and initializes the database table for teams if it doesn't exist. This method is called during application startup to ensure the table exists. If the table doesn't exist, it creates it.

    • AddTeam

      public void AddTeam(Team selectedTeam)
      Adds a new team to the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedTeam - The team to be added to the database.

    • updateTeam

      public void updateTeam()
      Updates the selected team with the modified list of students. This method is called when the user edits and saves the team. It updates the team's list of students in the database and user interface.

    • updateStudents

      public void updateStudents(Team selectedTeam)
      Updates the list of students for a selected team. This method is called when the user edits and saves the team. It determines which students need to be added or removed from the team and updates the database accordingly.
      Parameters:
      selectedTeam - The team whose students are being updated.

    • addRemoveStudents

      public void addRemoveStudents(List<Student> toaddRemove, Team selectedTeam)
      Adds or removes students to/from a selected team. This method is called when updating the list of students for a team. It adds or removes students in the database and updates the team's list.
      Parameters:
      toaddRemove - The list of students to be added or removed.
      selectedTeam - The team for which students are being added or removed.
